Access server: {{code|lang=php|1=$link = mysql_connect(host  user  password);}} or {{code|lang=php|1=$db = new mysqli(host  user  password);}} or {{code|lang=php|1=$db = new PDO('mysql:host=hostname;dbname=dbname'  'username'  'password');}}
Use database: {{code|lang=php|1=mysql_select_db(name  $link);}} or {{code|lang=php|1=$db = new mysqli(host  user  password  name);}} or {{code|lang=php|1=$db->select_db(name);}}
